name: Sling Shot (PIXbits)
description:
SLING SHOT BETA

Aim and release! Jump from one target to another. Do you have what it takes to beat all 17 levels? 

WASD to aim, space to release.

Added and fixed:
  • Saving progress
  • High rez text
  • Transition issue
  • Other bugs
CHOOSE YOUR SHAPES! BEWARE OF THE SPIKES!

 

HIT TARGETS TO SCORE!      BOUNCE, BOUNCE, ON THE WALLS!     AND WATCH OUT FOR THE RISING WATER! YOU CAN ONLY BOUNCE OFF WALLS THAT ARE THE SAME COLOR AS YOURSELF! ENJOY!! :D

(Running this game on windows is laggy and low-rezd, but can be still played by opening rawGame.love file with Love2d application. My recommendation is to play on a Mac)
